price: Зар они желе да праве сплетке?! Па, они који не верују, они су у сплетки!
arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am yurīdūna kaydan fa-alladhīna kafarū humu al-makīdūna
